title: Item Selector
description: Describes how to select or match to a specific item from an array of values described by an XDM schema.  Matching may be done based on array index, @id, @type, or schema URI.

xdm:index.title: Index
xdm:index.description: When present, indicates the item at this array index should be selected.

xdm:id.title: ID
xdm:id.description: When present, indicates the item with this @id value should be selected.

xdm:type.title: Type
xdm:type.description: When present, indicates the item with this @type value should be selected.

xdm:schema.title: Schema
xdm:schema.description: When present, indicates the item which conforms to this schema URI should be selected.
